entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
